list_definition.definition: the men and women whose job is to prevent crime, keep order, see that laws are obeyed etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The police are investigating the matter
(also adjective) the police force, a police officer.
We cannot police the whole area.

list_ex_of_english: Ghanaian policing has much in common with policing elsewhere.

The implementation of these plans has however never been policed.
If diverting resources to land improvement and productivity increasing practices is profitable for privately held land, then land-titling polices may help mitigate these negative externalities.
However, the issue of policing remains highly contentious.
With the appointment of his new gardes, the burden of policing the craft would be transferred to the state.
No longer was the state responsible for policing the health of society: everyone was to be his or her own policeman.
Moreover, social work practices were influential in shaping the rhetoric and method of women's policing work.
